title: Neon Glass Card
htmlCode:
Neon Glass

Modern frosted glass effect with neon glow.
cssCode: .glass-card { padding: 30px; border-radius: 20px; background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1); backdrop-filter: blur(10px); box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0,255,255,0.5); color:#fff; text-align:center; font-family:sans-serif; transition:0.3s; } .glass-card:hover { box-shadow: 0 0 40px rgba(0,255,255,0.9); transform: translateY(-5px); }

title: Gradient Button
cssCode: .gradient-btn { padding:12px 28px; border-radius:50px; background:linear-gradient(45deg,#ff6ec4,#7873f5); color:white; font-size:16px; border:none; cursor:pointer; transition:0.4s; } .gradient-btn:hover { background:linear-gradient(45deg,#7873f5,#ff6ec4); transform:scale(1.1); }

title: Animated Loader
cssCode: .gradient-loader { width:50px; height:50px; border-radius:50%; background:conic-gradient(#ff6ec4,#7873f5,#4ade80,#ff6ec4); animation: spin 1s linear infinite; margin:auto; } @keyframes spin { 0%{transform:rotate(0deg);} 100%{transform:rotate(360deg);} }

title: Spinner
Toggle Dark Mode
cssCode: .dark-switch { position: relative; width:60px; height:34px; display:inline-block; } .dark-switch input{display:none;} .slider{position:absolute; cursor:pointer; top:0; left:0; right:0; bottom:0; background:#333; border-radius:34px; transition:.4s;} .slider:before{position:absolute; content:''; height:26px; width:26px; background:white; border-radius:50%; left:4px; bottom:4px; transition:.4s;} input:checked + .slider{background:#4ade80;} input:checked + .slider:before{transform:translateX(26px);}

title: Typing Text Effect
jsCode: const txt='Hello, Welcome to Universe UI!'; let i=0; const typingEl=document.getElementById('typing'); function typeWriter(){ if(i<txt.length){ typingEl.innerText+=txt.charAt(i); i++; setTimeout(typeWriter,100);} } typeWriter();
